description: A commitment to long distance trail running does not stop because the weather turns. With advanced Gore-Tex protection and an all-season Vibram® Megagrip outsole, the Norvan LD 2 GTX runs all year. Progressive materials and construction make the LD 2 lighter and more durable than the original while maintaining award-winning performance and comfort. Vibram® LiteBase technology and a new midsole material combine to shed grams, and Gore Invisible Fit Technology increases comfort and breathability.
name: Arcteryx Norvan LD 2 GTX Shoe - Mens
